title: STK Steakhouse operates in United States
statement: STK Steakhouse has locations across multiple U.S. states including Arizona, California, Colorado, Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Massachusetts, Nevada, New York, North Carolina, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, and Washington.

citations.quote: Arizona Scottsdale, California Los Angeles San Diego San Francisco Topanga, Colorado Denver, D.C. Washington DC, Florida Aventura Orlando South Beach, Georgia Atlanta
